branchCategory.name: IR
branchCategory.description: <p>Series IR Precision Regulators are designed to be compact and light weight. The maximum set pressure has been expanded from the conventional 0.7MPa to 0.8MPa. Relief flow has been increased by nearly 5 times (compared to SMC IR201, IR401). The optional bracket and pressure gauge can be mounted on either the front or back of the unit.</p>

branchItem.name: IR1000-A~3000-A, Precision Regulator

IR1000~3000, Precision Regulator
IR1000/2000/3000, Mounting Bracket
branchItem.description: Bracket for mounting Series IR Precision Regulators.
